title: Garden of Eden soup
ingredients: ['300 ml (10 fl oz) boiling water', '1 vegetable stock cube, crumbled, or 2 tsp vegetable bouillon powder or paste', '1 litre (1¾ pints) tomato juice', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '4 spring onions, finely chopped', '1 large potato, scrubbed and diced', '1 large carrot, diced', '100 g (3½ oz) frozen broccoli florets', '100 g (3½ oz) white cabbage, finely shredded or coarsely chopped', '55 g (2 oz) frozen cut green beans', '55 g (2 oz) frozen peas', '55 g (2 oz) frozen broad beans', '8 large sprigs of fresh basil', 'salt and pepper']
